potion.name: Potion
potion.description: Restores a small amount of health.

megapotion.name: Mega Potion
megapotion.description: Restores a moderate amount of health.

maxpotion.name: Max Potion
maxpotion.description: Fully restores health and maximizes the size of your Health Gauge.

ancientpotion.name: Ancient Potion
ancientpotion.description: Fully restores health and maximizes the size of your Health and Stamina Gauges.

herbalmedicine.name: Herbal Medicine
herbalmedicine.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

nulberry.name: Nulberry
nulberry.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

energydrink.name: Energy Drink
energydrink.description: A Guild-approved beverage that boosts your stamina. Helps shake off sleep, too!

ration.name: Ration
ration.description: Food that restores a bit of stamina.

raresteak.name: Rare Steak
raresteak.description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina. This one's still red in the middle.

well-donesteak.name: Well-done Steak
well-donesteak.description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina and keeps it at max for a longer period. Meat done right!

burntmeat.name: Burnt Meat
burntmeat.description: Provides a small boost to your stamina. Can be eaten quickly.

cooldrink.name: Cool Drink
cooldrink.description: Provides temporary relief from extreme heat.

nutrients.name: Nutrients
nutrients.description: Very slightly increases your maximum health level.

meganutrients.name: Mega Nutrients
meganutrients.description: Slightly increases your maximum health level.

immunizer.name: Immunizer
immunizer.description: Boosts your natural ability to heal.

asterajerky.name: Astera Jerky
asterajerky.description: Juicy, dried meat made by Astera's chef. Boosts natural healing and cures bleeding.

dashjuice.name: Dash Juice
dashjuice.description: Dulls one's sense of exhaustion. Reduces stamina depletion for a time.

mightseed.name: Might Seed
mightseed.description: Temporarily strengthens your attacks when ingested by improving energy flow.

demondrug.name: Demondrug
demondrug.description: Boosts your attack power by filling you with - guess what? - demonic strength.

megademondrug.name: Mega Demondrug
megademondrug.description: Boosts your attack power even more than a regular Demondrug.

mightpill.name: Might Pill
mightpill.description: Temporarily endows you with the strength of a mighty god. Potent!

adamantseed.name: Adamant Seed
adamantseed.description: Temporarily raises your defense when ingested by hardening tissue.

armorskin.name: Armorskin
armorskin.description: Boosts your defense by turning your skin as hard as rock.

megaarmorskin.name: Mega Armorskin
megaarmorskin.description: Boosts your defense even more than a regular armorskin.

adamantpill.name: Adamant Pill
adamantpill.description: Temporarily makes your skin as hard as adamant. Potent!

lifepowder.name: Lifepowder
lifepowder.description: Produces a healing cloud in the area around the user.

herbalpowder.name: Herbal Powder
herbalpowder.description: A mysterious powder that produces a cloud around the area that restores health and neutralizes poison.

demonpowder.name: Demon Powder
demonpowder.description: A mysterious powder that produces a cloud around the area that temporarily strengthens attacks.

hardshellpowder.name: Hardshell Powder
hardshellpowder.description: A mysterious powder that produces a cloud around the area that temporarily strengthens defense.

honey.name: Honey
honey.description: Highly nutritious honey. Combine this with Potions to craft Mega Potions for maximum potency.

fireherb.name: Fire Herb
fireherb.description: A wondrous, flammable plant. Useful for crafting explosives.

flowfern.name: Flowfern
flowfern.description: This plant's leaves store a great amount of water. A component for making Water Ammo.

snowherb.name: Snow Herb
snowherb.description: A plant that radiates ice-cold air. Use in combinations to create freeze ammo.

sleepherb.name: Sleep Herb
sleepherb.description: A plant containing sleeping agents. Used to craft tranquilizers.

ivy.name: Ivy
ivy.description: A lightweight and extremely strong plant. Used to make nets for pitfall traps.

smokenut.name: Smokenut
smokenut.description: A nut that produces a copious amount of smoke. Combine with other items to create smoke with various properties.

dragonfellberry.name: Dragonfell Berry
dragonfellberry.description: A mysterious berry, rumored for eons to be loathed by dragons. Required to craft Dragon Ammo.

bluemushroom.name: Blue Mushroom
bluemushroom.description: A mushroom infused with power-enhancing effects. Used in restorative items.

mandragora.name: Mandragora
mandragora.description: A dangerous fungus said to draw the life out of people. Beware. Required to craft Max Potions.

nitroshroom.name: Nitroshroom
nitroshroom.description: A hard-to-find mushroom with the power to generate blazing heat. Required to craft Gunpowder.

devil'sblight.name: Devil's Blight
devil'sblight.description: A very rare fungus that pulses with extreme heat. Add to a barrel bomb for a dramatically stronger blast.

parashroom.name: Parashroom
parashroom.description: A mushroom that induces paralysis. Required to craft Tranq Bombs.

toadstool.name: Toadstool
toadstool.description: A poisonous fungus. Can be used as a toxin for knives.

exciteshroom.name: Exciteshroom
exciteshroom.description: This one has a very strange aroma. Is it edible? Only one way to find out! Required to craft Farcasters.

chillshroom.name: Chillshroom
chillshroom.description: This mushroom is a primary ingredient in cool drinks.

bitterbug.name: Bitterbug
bitterbug.description: A sharp-tasting bug with innate healing abilities. Used as an ingredient in many medicines.

flashbug.name: Flashbug
flashbug.description: An insect that emits a powerful flash when it dies. Required to craft Flash Pods.

godbug.name: Godbug
godbug.description: An insect said to live a millennium. Combine it with other items to add their properties to the powder.

thunderbug.name: Thunderbug
thunderbug.description: An insect that emits electricity when struck. Required to craft Shock Traps and Thunder Ammo.

baitbug.name: Baitbug
baitbug.description: An insect used as fishing bait. A fish favorite, it practically races down the nearest gilly gullet.

kelbihorn.name: Kelbi Horn
kelbihorn.description: While not practical for forging purposes, Kelbi horns are a vital component of many items.

dashextract.name: Dash Extract
dashextract.description: A mysterious substance culled from certain monsters that increases endurance.

nourishingextract.name: Nourishing Extract
nourishingextract.description: Can be obtained from certain large monsters. Has the ability to amplify the effects of certain medicines.

screamersac.name: Screamer Sac
screamersac.description: A monster organ that emits an earsplitting sonic blast when ruptured. Used to craft screamer pods.

catalyst.name: Catalyst
catalyst.description: Works with other materials to enhance their effects. Cannot be used by itself.

tranqbomb.name: Tranq Bomb
tranqbomb.description: A hand grenade used to capture monsters ensnared in traps. Can be slammed against the ground.

flashpod.name: Flash Pod
flashpod.description: Slinger ammo that flashes brightly on impact. Fire it right under a monster's nose to blind it.

screamerpod.name: Screamer Pod
screamerpod.description: Used as ammo for your slinger. Emits a harsh, high-frequency sound that can disrupt sensitive monsters.

dungpod.name: Dung Pod
dungpod.description: Slinger ammo that releases a strong odor on impact. Causes certain monsters to flee.

smokebomb.name: Smoke Bomb
smokebomb.description: Creates a large cloud of smoke wherever it lands.

poisonsmokebomb.name: Poison Smoke Bomb
poisonsmokebomb.description: Releases a toxic cloud of mist when used. Also popular as a household bug bomb.

farcaster.name: Farcaster
farcaster.description: Call for a wingdrake to transport you to the nearest camp. Can also be used during battles.

rawmeat.name: Raw Meat
rawmeat.description: Meat carved from a monster. Can be cooked, combined, or used to set a trap.

poisonedmeat.name: Poisoned Meat
poisonedmeat.description: Raw meat that poisons whatever eats it. Makes great bait for traps.

tingedmeat.name: Tinged Meat
tingedmeat.description: Raw meat that paralyzes whatever eats it. Makes great bait for traps.

druggedmeat.name: Drugged Meat
druggedmeat.description: Raw meat that puts whatever eats it to sleep. Makes great bait for traps.

gunpowder.name: Gunpowder
gunpowder.description: A dangerous substance that explodes when struct or heated.

bouncebomb.name: Bounce Bomb
bouncebomb.description: Launches into the air when set. This modified bomb requires skill to use.

megabouncebomb.name: Mega Bounce Bomb
megabouncebomb.description: An improved version of the bounce bomb. Requires some skill to use.

largebarrel.name: Large Barrel
largebarrel.description: A large, empty barrel. Combine with gunpowder to make it into a bomb.

largebarrelbomb.name: Large Barrel Bomb
largebarrelbomb.description: A powerful bomb triggered by external physical impact.

megabarrelbomb.name: Mega Barrel Bomb
megabarrelbomb.description: An upgraded large barrel bomb. Effective against large monsters.

spiderweb.name: Spider Web
spiderweb.description: A very sticky web. Used to craft pitfall traps.

net.name: Net
net.description: A sturdy net that supports a certain amount of weight without breaking. Perfect for pitfall traps.

traptool.name: Trap Tool
traptool.description: A must-have item for putting together pitfall traps and other kinds of traps.

pitfalltrap.name: Pitfall Trap
pitfalltrap.description: A trap for catching certain large monsters. It is tripped by a heavy weight.

shocktrap.name: Shock Trap
shocktrap.description: A trap that immobilizes a target. Use it to capture monsters.

rolled-updung.name: Rolled-up Dung
rolled-updung.description: A ball of condensed monster dung. Used to make dung pods for your slinger.

dung.name: Dung
dung.description: Exudes a prodigious smell. Used to make ammo for your slinger called dung pods.

arowanabait.name: Arowana Bait
arowanabait.description: A ball of bait favored by fish of the Arowana family.

gunpowderfishbait.name: Gunpowderfish Bait
gunpowderfishbait.description: A ball of bait favored by fish of the Gunpowderfish family.

goldenfishbait.name: Goldenfish Bait
goldenfishbait.description: A ball of bait favored by fish of the Goldenfish family.

boomerang.name: Boomerang
boomerang.description: An unusually-shaped weapon from abroad that returns to its user when thrown.

binoculars.name: Binoculars
binoculars.description: Allows you to see farther and observe from a distance.

powercharm.name: Powercharm
powercharm.description: An amulet that strengthens attacks. Just carrying this gives you demonic strength.

powertalon.name: Powertalon
powertalon.description: A charm that strengthens attacks. Its effects are amplified by the dragon parts it contains.

armorcharm.name: Armorcharm
armorcharm.description: An amulet that increases defense. Just carrying this hardens your skin like stone.

armortalon.name: Armortalon
armortalon.description: A charm that increases defense. Its effects are amplified by the dragon parts it contains.

needleberry.name: Needleberry
needleberry.description: A nut covered in needle-like spines. Used to make spread ammo.

blastnut.name: Blastnut
blastnut.description: A nut used to make sticky ammo.

dragonstrikenut.name: Dragonstrike Nut
dragonstrikenut.description: A nut that explodes on impact. Used to make wyvern ammo.

latchberry.name: Latchberry
latchberry.description: A nut that bears a spiral groove. Used to make pierce ammo.

bomberry.name: Bomberry
bomberry.description: A nut that ruptures on impact. Used to make cluster bombs.

flamenut.name: Flamenut
flamenut.description: Used to make gunpowder that increases ammo firepower.

blazenut.name: Blazenut
blazenut.description: Used to make gunpowder that greatly increases ammo firepower.

gunpowderlevel2.name: Gunpowder Level 2
gunpowderlevel2.description: Combustible powser. Combine with level 1 ammo to raise its level.

whetfishfin.name: Whetfish Fin
whetfishfin.description: A fish fin used to sharpen weapons. Restores sharpness greatly, but good for fewer uses than a whetstone.

whetfishfin+.name: Whetfish Fin+
whetfishfin+.description: A fish fin used to sharpen weapons. Works better than a whetstone, and can be reused if you're lucky.

sushifishscale.name: Sushifish Scale
sushifishscale.description: A scale from a Sushifish. Eat to restore a small amount of health. Also works to treat bleeding.

greatsushifishscale.name: Great Sushifish Scale
greatsushifishscale.description: Scale from a Great Sushifish. Eat to get large health boost, a natural healing boost, and treat bleeding.

gunpowderfishscale.name: Gunpowderfish Scale
gunpowderfishscale.description: The scales of a Gunpowderfish. Combine with a large barrel bomb to dramatically increase its firepower.

greatgunpowderfishscale.name: Great Gunpowderfish Scale
greatgunpowderfishscale.description: The scales of a Great Gunpowderfish. Combine with a large barrel bomb to make a mega barrel bomb.

burstarowanascale.name: Burst Arowana Scale
burstarowanascale.description: The scales of a Burst Arowana. Combine with fire herb to make a large amount of level 2 gunpowder.

greatburstarowanascale.name: Great Burst Arowana Scale
greatburstarowanascale.description: The scales of a Great Burst Arowana. Combine with fire herb to make a vast amount of level 2 gunpowder.

bombarowanascale.name: Bomb Arowana Scale
bombarowanascale.description: The scales of a Bomb Arowana. Combine with fire herb to make a large amount of Lv3 gunpowder.

greatbombarowanascale.name: Great Bomb Arowana Scale
greatbombarowanascale.description: The scales of a Great Bomb Arowana. Combine with fire herb to make a vast amount of Lv3 gunpowder.

emptyphial.name: Empty Phial
emptyphial.description: A regularly old empty phial. Nothing more, nothing less.

ironore.name: Iron Ore
ironore.description: Ore that can be smelted into metal and used for many different purposes.

machaliteore.name: Machalite Ore
machaliteore.description: Ore that's more difficult to procure than Iron Ore. Produces fine metal.

dragoniteore.name: Dragonite Ore
dragoniteore.description: An ore that yields metal superior to that of Machalite. Invaluable for making durable armor.

carbaliteore.name: Carbalite Ore
carbaliteore.description: Ore obtained from mining outcrops. Still under research, but known to yield highly pure metal.

fuciumore.name: Fucium Ore
fuciumore.description: Ore obtained from the Elder's Recess. A mysterious metal, capable of fusing nearly any two materials together.

earthcrystal.name: Earth Crystal
earthcrystal.description: Crystallized microbes prized as an abrasive when forging weapons. Mainly found in the Wildspire Waste.

coralcrystal-rarity4.name: Coral Crystal - Rarity 4
coralcrystal-rarity4.description: Crystal prized at the Smithy for use in high-grade abrasives. Mainly found in the Coral Highlands.

dragonveincrystal.name: Dragonvein Crystal
dragonveincrystal.description: Mined from high rank areas. Many expect this newly-discovered crystal to usher in a new era of metalwork.

lightcrystal.name: Lightcrystal
lightcrystal.description: A precious and extremely hard substance with a faint glow. Sometimes used for crafting tools.

novacrystal.name: Novacrystal
novacrystal.description: High quality Lightcrystal. Highly coveted for its rarity, it's used for only the finest of metalworking.

firecellstone.name: Firecell Stone
firecellstone.description: A magma-like deposit that only trained hands can work with. Armor made from it is first-class.

aquacoreore.name: Aquacore Ore
aquacoreore.description: A valuable mineral used to create charms. Gives off a vibrant glow that mirrors the ocean.

spiritcoreore.name: Spiritcore Ore
spiritcoreore.description: A valuable mineral used to create charms. Gives off a warm, sunny glow.

dreamcoreore.name: Dreamcore Ore
dreamcoreore.description: A valuable mineral used to create charms. Gives off a blazing glow reminiscent of a bonfire.

dragoncoreore.name: Dragoncore Ore
dragoncoreore.description: A valuable mineral used to create charms. Gives off a mysterious glow that grants the holder sagely wisdom.

armorsphere.name: Armor Sphere
armorsphere.description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it by a tiny amount.

armorsphere+.name: Armor Sphere+
armorsphere+.description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it by a small amount.

advancedarmorsphere.name: Advanced Armor Sphere
advancedarmorsphere.description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it.

hardarmorsphere.name: Hard Armor Sphere
hardarmorsphere.description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to significantly improve it.

heavyarmorsphere.name: Heavy Armor Sphere
heavyarmorsphere.description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to greatly improve it.

sturdybone.name: Sturdy Bone
sturdybone.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Coral Highlands and Rotten Vale.

qualitybone.name: Quality Bone
qualitybone.description: A bone used as crafting material. Its ease of use and hardness allow it to be shaped into better gear.

ancientbone.name: Ancient Bone
ancientbone.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Ancient Forest. Its size evokes a certain primal quality.

boulderbone.name: Boulder Bone
boulderbone.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Wildspire Waste. Its size evokes a certain primal quality.

coralbone.name: Coral Bone
coralbone.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Coral Highlands. Its size evokes a certain primal quality.

warpedbone.name: Warped Bone
warpedbone.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Rotten Vale. Its size evokes a certain primal quality.

brutalbone.name: Brutal Bone
brutalbone.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Elder's Recess. Its size evokes a certain primal quality.

dragonbonerelic.name: Dragonbone Relic
dragonbonerelic.description: A high quality material found in bone piles. The only remains left of a species of dragon now lost to time.

unknownskull.name: Unknown Skull
unknownskull.description: A rare material found in bonepiles in the Elder's Recess. It appears to be some kind of animal skull.

greathornfly.name: Great Hornfly
greathornfly.description: Discovered by Botanical Research. An insect with a giant horn, massive shell, and butterfly-like wings.

sinistercloth.name: Sinister Cloth
sinistercloth.description: Suspect cloth the Tailraider Safari dug up from who-knows-where. Drips with an aura of pure evil.

monsterbones.name: Monster Bone S
monsterbones.description: A material found in bonepiles. Indispensable for both hunting and daily life.

monsterbonem.name: Monster Bone M
monsterbonem.description: Bone obtained from large monsters. Strong yet flexible, it's as reliable as steel or wood.

monsterbonel.name: Monster Bone L
monsterbonel.description: Bone obtained from large monsters. Hard to work with due to its size, but vital when crafting larger items.

monsterbone+.name: Monster Bone+
monsterbone+.description: Bone obtained from large monsters. Hard to obtain, but vital for crafting powerful equipment.

monsterkeenbone.name: Monster Keenbone
monsterkeenbone.description: Bone obtained from high rank large monsters. It has a razor-sharp tip that retains its strength after forging.

monsterhardbone.name: Monster Hardbone
monsterhardbone.description: Precious bone obtained from high rank large monsters. Their rarity makes them highly sought after.

elderdragonbone.name: Elder Dragon Bone
elderdragonbone.description: A bone from an elder dragon. It exudes the great majesty of the beast that bore it.

sharpclaw.name: Sharp Claw
sharpclaw.description: Obtained from small fanged wyverns. Unlike wyvern claws, this is shaped to grip objects.

piercingclaw.name: Piercing Claw
piercingclaw.description: Material from high rank small fanged wyverns. Sharp enough that it might serve as a makeshift knife.

monsterfluid.name: Monster Fluid
monsterfluid.description: Material obtained from small insects. Mixes with insect gastric fluids to form adhesive.

monsterbroth.name: Monster Broth
monsterbroth.description: Material from high rank insects. A rich broth made from only the thickest of monster juices.

poisonsac.name: Poison Sac
poisonsac.description: A monster organ that contains a lethal toxin. Handle with extreme care.

toxinsac.name: Toxin Sac
toxinsac.description: A monster organ filled with an extremely potent toxin. Just touching it is dangerous.

paralysissac.name: Paralysis Sac
paralysissac.description: A monster organ that contains paralyzing neurotoxins.

omniplegiasac.name: Omniplegia Sac
omniplegiasac.description: A monster organ filled with potent neurotoxins. A single touch can cause paralysis.

sleepsac.name: Sleep Sac
sleepsac.description: A monster organ that contains a knockout powder capable of inducing sleep.

comasac.name: Coma Sac
comasac.description: A monster organ that contains dangerous powder. One whiff can induce a coma.

flamesac.name: Flame Sac
flamesac.description: A monster organ filled with flammable powder. Handle with extreme care.

infernosac.name: Inferno Sac
infernosac.description: A monster organ filled with powder that ignites if it so much as touches air. Danger!

aquasac.name: Aqua Sac
aquasac.description: A monster organ designed to hold and preserve water.

torrentsac.name: Torrent Sac
torrentsac.description: A monster organ designed to hold and preserve copious amounts of water.

frostsac.name: Frost Sac
frostsac.description: A monster internal organ, filled with extremely low temperature fluid. Handle with care.

freezersac.name: Freezer Sac
freezersac.description: A monster organ with tremendous freezing power. Turns its surroundings to ice.

electrosac.name: Electro Sac
electrosac.description: A monster organ that can store up electricity, which is released on impact.

thundersac.name: Thunder Sac
thundersac.description: A monster organ that can store up large amounts of high voltage electricity.

birdwyverngem.name: Bird Wyvern Gem
birdwyverngem.description: A valuable gem that can be harvested from bird wyverns. Said to fetch a high price on the market.

wyverngem.name: Wyvern Gem
wyverngem.description: Throughout a wyvern's life, impurities gather and form this peculiar gem.

elderdragonblood.name: Elder Dragon Blood
elderdragonblood.description: Contains an unknown compound. The object of much scholarly research.

mosswinehide.name: Mosswine Hide
mosswinehide.description: A musty hide covered in moss.

warmpelt.name: Warm Pelt
warmpelt.description: A pelt from a small animal. Used for many things, but mostly just regular clothes.

high-qualitypelt.name: High-quality Pelt
high-qualitypelt.description: Rare pelt from a small animal. Feels wonderful to the touch and valued highly by the Commission.

vespoidshell.name: Vespoid Shell
vespoidshell.description: Vespoid material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

vespoidcarapace.name: Vespoid Carapace
vespoidcarapace.description: Rare Vespoid material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

vespoidwing.name: Vespoid Wing
vespoidwing.description: Vespoid material. Obtained by carving. Light and sharp, used in many weapons.

vespoidinnerwing.name: Vespoid Innerwing
vespoidinnerwing.description: Rare Vespoid material. Obtained by carving. Light and sharp, used in many weapons.

hornetaurshell.name: Hornetaur Shell
hornetaurshell.description: Hornetaur material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

hornetaurwing.name: Hornetaur Wing
hornetaurwing.description: Hornetaur material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

hornetaurhead.name: Hornetaur Head
hornetaurhead.description: Hornetaur material. Obtained by carving. Unusual, used in select gear.

hornetaurcarapace.name: Hornetaur Carapace
hornetaurcarapace.description: Rare Hornetaur material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

hornetaurinnerwing.name: Hornetaur Innerwing
hornetaurinnerwing.description: Rare Hornetaur material. Obtained by carving. Light and sharp, used in many weapons.

gajauskin.name: Gajau Skin
gajauskin.description: Gajau material. Obtained by carving. Water-resistant, used to craft gear.

gajauwhisker.name: Gajau Whisker
gajauwhisker.description: Gajau material. Obtained by carving. Hardy, used to craft gear.

gajauscale.name: Gajau Scale
gajauscale.description: Rare Gajau material. Obtained by carving. Water-resistant, used to craft gear.

grandgajauwhisker.name: Grand Gajau Whisker
grandgajauwhisker.description: Rare Gajau material. Obtained by carving. Hardy, used to craft gear.

wingdrakehide.name: Wingdrake Hide
wingdrakehide.description: A material carved from wingdrakes. Lightweight and often used when crafting armor.

wingdrakehide+.name: Wingdrake Hide+
wingdrakehide+.description: A rare material carved from wingdrakes. Lightweight and often used when crafting armor.

barnoshide+.name: Barnos Hide+
barnoshide+.description: Rare Barnos material. Obtained by carving. Supple, used to craft gear.

barnostalon.name: Barnos Talon
barnostalon.description: Rare Barnos material. Obtained by carving. Unusual, used in select gear.

kestodonshell.name: Kestodon Shell
kestodonshell.description: Kestodon material. Obtained by carving. Sturdy, used to craft gear.

kestodonscalp.name: Kestodon Scalp
kestodonscalp.description: Kestodon material. Obtained by carving. Unusual, used in select gear.

kestodoncarapace.name: Kestodon Carapace
kestodoncarapace.description: Superior Kestodon material. Obtained by carving. Sturdy, used to craft gear.

gastodoncarapace.name: Gastodon Carapace
gastodoncarapace.description: Rare Gastodon material. Obtained by carving. Sturdy, used to craft gear.

gastodonhorn.name: Gastodon Horn
gastodonhorn.description: Rare Gastodon material. Obtained by carving. Unusual, used in select gear.

jagrasscale.name: Jagras Scale
jagrasscale.description: Jagras material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

jagrashide.name: Jagras Hide
jagrashide.description: Jagras material. Obtained by carving. Supple, used to craft gear.

jagrasscale+.name: Jagras Scale+
jagrasscale+.description: Rare Jagras material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

jagrashide+.name: Jagras Hide+
jagrashide+.description: Rare Jagras material. Obtained by carving. Supple, used to craft gear.

shamosscale.name: Shamos Scale
shamosscale.description: Shamos material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

shamoshide.name: Shamos Hide
shamoshide.description: Shamos material. Obtained by carving. Supple, used to craft gear.

shamosscale+.name: Shamos Scale+
shamosscale+.description: Rare Shamos material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

shamoshide+.name: Shamos Hide+
shamoshide+.description: Rare Shamos material. Obtained by carving. Supple, used to craft gear.

girrosscale.name: Girros Scale
girrosscale.description: Girros material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

girroshide.name: Girros Hide
girroshide.description: Girros material. Obtained by carving. Supple, used to craft gear.

girrosfang.name: Girros Fang
girrosfang.description: Girros material. Obtained by carving. Grants paralytic properties.

girrosscale+.name: Girros Scale+
girrosscale+.description: Rare Girros material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

girroshide+.name: Girros Hide+
girroshide+.description: Rare Girros material. Obtained by carving. Supple, used to craft gear.

greatjagrasscale.name: Great Jagras Scale
greatjagrasscale.description: Great Jagras material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

greatjagrashide.name: Great Jagras Hide

stickyammo3.description: Extremely powerful ammo that lodges in a target and explodes. Also stuns.

clusterbomb1.name: Cluster Bomb 1
clusterbomb1.description: Ammo that fragments into three shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire!

clusterbomb2.name: Cluster Bomb 2
clusterbomb2.description: Ammo that fragments into four shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire!

clusterbomb3.name: Cluster Bomb 3
clusterbomb3.description: Ammo that fragments into five shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire!

slicingammo.name: Slicing Ammo
slicingammo.description: Ammo that ejects sharp blades on impact, which can sever tails.

flamingammo.name: Flaming Ammo
flamingammo.description: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters susceptible to fire.

waterammo.name: Water Ammo
waterammo.description: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters susceptible to water.

thunderammo.name: Thunder Ammo
thunderammo.description: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters susceptible to thunder.

freezeammo.name: Freeze Ammo
freezeammo.description: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters susceptible to ice.

dragonammo.name: Dragon Ammo
dragonammo.description: Elderseal-imbued ammo that packs a punch against monsters weak to dragon.

poisonammo1.name: Poison Ammo 1
poisonammo1.description: Poisons target, but may require several shots.

poisonammo2.name: Poison Ammo 2
poisonammo2.description: Enhanced ammo that inflicts poison. Some targets require multiple shots.

paralysisammo1.name: Paralysis Ammo 1
paralysisammo1.description: Ammo that causes paralysis. Some targets require multiple shots.

paralysisammo2.name: Paralysis Ammo 2
paralysisammo2.description: Enhanced ammo that causes paralysis. Some targets require multiple shots.

sleepammo1.name: Sleep Ammo 1
sleepammo1.description: Ammo that induces sleep. Some targets require multiple shots.

sleepammo2.name: Sleep Ammo 2
sleepammo2.description: Enhanced ammo that induces sleep. Some targets require multiple shots.

exhaustammo1.name: Exhaust Ammo 1
exhaustammo1.description: Ammo that drains a monster's stamina.

exhaustammo2.name: Exhaust Ammo 2
exhaustammo2.description: Enhanced ammo that drains a monster's stamina.

recoverammo1.name: Recover Ammo 1
recoverammo1.description: Ammo that restores a small amount of health to an ally upon impact.

recoverammo2.name: Recover Ammo 2
recoverammo2.description: Ammo that restores a moderate amount of health to an ally upon impact.

demonammo.name: Demon Ammo
demonammo.description: Ammo that fills the target with savage amounts of strength.

armorammo.name: Armor Ammo
armorammo.description: Ammo that makes the target's skin as hard as stone.

wyvernammo.name: Wyvern Ammo
wyvernammo.description: Ammo created through years of research into Wyvern's Fire.

gunpowderlevel3.name: Gunpowder Level 3
gunpowderlevel3.description: Highly combustible powder. Combine with level 1 ammo to raise its level.

azurestargem.name: Azure Stargem
azurestargem.description: Special material for those who overcome the USJ challenge. Shines a miraculous blue.

redorb.name: Red Orb
redorb.description: Blood of demonic beings condensed into stone. Can be used to craft stylish devil hunter equipment.

aetheryteshard.name: Aetheryte Shard
aetheryteshard.description: A fragment of a glittering crystal. Contains an unknown, otherworldly energy called "aether".

firstfleetticket.name: First Fleet Ticket
firstfleetticket.description: A ticket with the First Fleet's flag and emblem. Redeem at the Smithy for something nice!?

kirinticket.name: Kirin Ticket
kirinticket.description: A ticket bearing Kirin, caressed by lightning. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

behemothmane.name: Behemoth Mane
behemothmane.description: Rare Behemoth material. Tinged with magical power that can summon meteors from the heavens.

behemothbone.name: Behemoth Bone
behemothbone.description: Rare Behemoth material. Bone so absurdly strong that it can even knock out legendary heroes.

behemothgreathorn.name: Behemoth Great Horn
behemothgreathorn.description: Rare Behemoth material. The ominous light that this horn emits leaves even the Warriors of Light shaken.

behemothshearclaw.name: Behemoth Shearclaw
behemothshearclaw.description: Rare Behemoth material. These claws cut down weaker prey in a single blow.

behemothtail.name: Behemoth Tail
behemothtail.description: Rare Behemoth material. A thick, muscular tail that sweeps away all threats.

lunastrascale+.name: Lunastra Scale+
lunastrascale+.description: Rare Lunastra material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

lunastracarapace.name: Lunastra Carapace
lunastracarapace.description: Rare Lunastra material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

lunastramane.name: Lunastra Mane
lunastramane.description: Rare Lunastra material. Obtained by collecting rare drops. Valuable, fire resistant material.

lunastrawing.name: Lunastra Wing
lunastrawing.description: Rare Lunastra material. Obtained by breaking its wings. Supple, used to craft gear.

lunastratail.name: Lunastra Tail
lunastratail.description: Rare Lunastra material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Stiff, used to craft gear.

lunastrahorn.name: Lunastra Horn
lunastrahorn.description: Rare Lunastra material. Obtained by breaking its head. Stout, used in many weapons.

lunastragem.name: Lunastra Gem
lunastragem.description: A rare gem said to have formed within Lunastra tissue. Within it lies unimaginable power.

wyverntear.name: Wyvern Tear
wyverntear.description: Bitter tears wept by wyverns on certain occasions. (Account Item)

largewyverntear.name: Large Wyvern Tear
largewyverntear.description: Large, bitter tears wept by wyverns on certain occasions. (Account Item)

dragontreasure.name: Dragon Treasure
dragontreasure.description: A shiny rock that elder dragons like to collect. (Account Item)

vaalhazakticket.name: Vaal Hazak Ticket
vaalhazakticket.description: A ticket bearing Vaal Hazak, engulfed in eternal darkness. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

kulvetarothemperornugget.name: Kulve Taroth Emperor Nugget
kulvetarothemperornugget.description: A glittering white gold nugget from Kulve Taroth. Bring it to the Smithy to craft new equipment!

lunastraticket.name: Lunastra Ticket
lunastraticket.description: A ticket with Lunastra and Teostra, roaring in unison. Redeem at the Smithy for special equipment.

eltaliteore.name: Eltalite Ore
eltaliteore.description: Ore obtained from mining outcrops. This transcendent ore refines into metal even stronger than carbalite.

xeno'jiivaticket.name: Xeno'jiiva Ticket
xeno'jiivaticket.description: A ticket bearing Xeno'jiiva, elder dragon transcended. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

zorahmagdarosticket.name: Zorah Magdaros Ticket
zorahmagdarosticket.description: A ticket bearing Zorah, trampling over the New World. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

nergiganteticket.name: Nergigante Ticket
nergiganteticket.description: A ticket bearing Nergigante, utter destruction incarnate. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

kushaladaoraticket.name: Kushala Daora Ticket
kushaladaoraticket.description: A ticket bearing Kushala Daora, commanding the winds. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

teostraticket.name: Teostra Ticket
teostraticket.description: A ticket bearing Teostra, ruling over purgatory. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

researchcommissionticket+.name: Research Commission Ticket+
researchcommissionticket+.description: A ticket issued by the commander to those who greatly aid the Research Commission. Show it to the Smithy!

steamticket.name: Steam Ticket
steamticket.description: A ticket issued by the Tech Chief to those who support the Steamworks. Show it to the smithy!

tigrexcoin.name: Tigrex Coin
tigrexcoin.description: A coin given to those who have bested a Tigrex in the master rank Arena.

herokingcoin.name: Hero King Coin
herokingcoin.description: A silver coin given to true hunters. It shines with all the glory of the Hunter King.

ancientfragment.name: Ancient Fragment
ancientfragment.description: A metal scrap the Tailraider Safari found on a master rank outing. Hard enough to be useful for...something?

banbarocoin.name: Banbaro Coin
banbarocoin.description: A coin given to those who have bested a Banbaro in the master rank Arena.

blackbeltcoin.name: Black Belt Coin
blackbeltcoin.description: A black coin with an abyssal gleam awarded to those who complete master rank Arena quests.

boaboaticket.name: Boaboa Ticket
boaboaticket.description: Proof of friendship with the Lynians of the Hoarfrost Reach. Show it to the smithy and see what happens!

conqueror'sseal.name: Conqueror's Seal
conqueror'sseal.description: A prize claimed only by those who have overcome myriad trials. Proves the bearer's valor beyond question.

freezerticket.name: Freezer Ticket
freezerticket.description: Named for the new Hoarfrost Reach invention that keeps food cold! Bring it to the Smithy for a nice surprise!

glavenuscoin.name: Glavenus Coin
glavenuscoin.description: A coin given to those who have bested a Glavenus in the master rank Arena.

nargacugacoin.name: Nargacuga Coin
nargacugacoin.description: A coin given to those who have bested a Nargacuga in the master rank Arena.

odogaroncoin.name: Odogaron Coin
odogaroncoin.description: A coin given to those who have bested a Odogaron in the master rank Arena.

paolumucoin.name: Paolumu Coin
paolumucoin.description: A coin given to those who have bested a Paolumu in the master rank Arena.

pearlspringticket.name: Pearlspring Ticket
pearlspringticket.description: A ticket featuring a Pearlspring Macaque bathing in a spring. Bring it to the Smithy for a nice surprise!

thermaeticket.name: Thermae Ticket
thermaeticket.description: A ticket issued to the most fervent of hot springs fanatics. Bring it to the Smithy for a nice surprise!

zinogrecoin.name: Zinogre Coin
zinogrecoin.description: A coin given to those who have bested a Zinogre in the master rank Arena.

aloyticket.name: Aloy Ticket
aloyticket.description: A ticket with an imge of a terrifying machine beast and a brave hunter. Allows you to craft special equipment.

ancientleshenskull.name: Ancient Leshen Skull
ancientleshenskull.description: Rare ancient leshen material. Embued with powerful magic and harboring unfathomable darkness.

mutagen.name: Mutagen
mutagen.description: A substance used to augment a witcher's abilities. Bring it to the Smithy for a nice surprise!

leshenskull.name: Leshen Skull
leshenskull.description: Proof of defeating a leshen. In another world, hunters hang this from their horse saddle to show off.

megamanticket.name: Mega Man Ticket
megamanticket.description: A ticket for a special Mega Man tie-in. Gives you access to special 8-bit retro Palico equipment.

sfvticketii.name: SFV Ticket II
sfvticketii.description: A Street Fighter V collaboration ticket. Wait, that female fighter is also going to hunt monsters!?

sfvticketiii.name: SFV Ticket III
sfvticketiii.description: A Street Fighter V collaboration ticket. Has that legendary world warrior leveled up his game!?

appreciationticket.name: Appreciation Ticket
appreciationticket.description: A ticket you receive for attending the Appreciation Fest. Can be exchanged for special equipment or fireworks.

autumnharvestticket.name: Autumn Harvest Ticket
autumnharvestticket.description: A ticket you receive for attending the Autumn Harvest Fest. Can be exchanged for special equipment or fireworks.

beetleticket.name: Beetle Ticket
beetleticket.description: A ticket with the heroic black ruler drawn on it. Redeem at the Resource Center for something nice?!

bristlycraketicket.name: Bristly Crake Ticket
bristlycraketicket.description: A ticket with the heroic black ruler drawn on it. Redeem at the Resource Center for something nice?!

bushiticket.name: Bushi Ticket
bushiticket.description: A voucher given to those who assisted in the special investigation. Be sure to show it to the resource center.

downycraketicket.name: Downy Crake Ticket
downycraketicket.description: A ticket with a pair of Downy Crakes drawn on it. Redeem at the Smithy for something nice!?

fauxticket.name: Faux Ticket
fauxticket.description: A ticket with a Mosswine and Felyne drawn on it. Redeem at the Resource Center for something nice!?

fauxticketii.name: Faux Ticket II
fauxticketii.description: A ticket with a Wiggler and eyepatch drawn on it. Redeem at the Resource Center for something nice!?

fauxticketiii.name: Faux Ticket III
fauxticketiii.description: A ticket with Kulu-Ya-Ku drawn on it. Redeem at the Resource Center for something nice!?

summerinsectfieldguide.name: Summer Insect Field Guide
summerinsectfieldguide.description: A field guide containing new info about Great Hornflies. Show it to the smithy for a ... novel armor set.

summertwilightticket.name: Summer Twilight Ticket
summertwilightticket.description: A ticket you receive for attending the Summer Twilight Fest. Can be exchanged for special equipment or firework.

winterstarticket.name: Winter Star Ticket
winterstarticket.description: A ticket you receive for attending the Winter Star Fest. Can be exchanged for special equipment or fireworks.

pierceammo2.name: Pierce Ammo 2
pierceammo2.description: High-grade armor-piercing ammo. Deals more hits than Pierce Ammo 1.

twilightfireworks.name: Twilight Fireworks
twilightfireworks.description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Summer Twilight Fest. Enjoy the summer heat with a bang!

harvestfireworks.name: Harvest Fireworks
harvestfireworks.description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Autumn Harvest Fest. Dance till the ground lights up in a blaze!

starfireworks.name: Star Fireworks
starfireworks.description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Winter Star Fest. Enjoy the festivities with a bang!

appreciationfireworks.name: Appreciation Fireworks
appreciationfireworks.description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Appreciation Fest. Show your thanks by lighting these fireworks!

fulgurbug.name: Fulgurbug
fulgurbug.description: Very rare Zinogre material, obtained with capture net while it's toppled. Compatible with thunder element.

gloamgrassbud.name: Gloamgrass Bud
gloamgrassbud.description: A plant with healing properties. Combine it with a Godbug to bring out its full potency.

shadowcoreore.name: Shadowcore Ore
shadowcoreore.description: A valuable mineral used to create charms. Its shine somehow saps the light away from its surroundings.

phantomcoreore.name: Phantomcore Ore
phantomcoreore.description: A valuable mineral used to create charms. Its otherworldy shimmering speaks to the power it contains.

purecrystal.name: Purecrystal
purecrystal.description: Very rare lightcrystal. Used by the forge workers to craft their tools due to its incredible hardness.

bathyciteore.name: Bathycite Ore
bathyciteore.description: Ore from Coral Highlands. Formed by millennia of pressure acting upon the bones of ancient organisms.

gracium.name: Gracium
gracium.description: Ore from the Hoarfrost Reach. When the light catches this rare and useful metal it takes on a pale blue shine.

meldsparore.name: Meldspar Ore
meldsparore.description: Ore often found in the Rotten Vale. Malleable but strong, it is broadly used in creating alloys for crafting.

spiritveincrystal.name: Spiritvein Crystal
spiritveincrystal.description: Mined from master rank areas. Little is known about these crystals save the complexity of their balance.

dragonveincoal.name: Dragonvein Coal
dragonveincoal.description: Special coal that contains the earth's energy within. Prized as fuel at the Commission's new base.

dragonveinshard.name: Dragonvein Shard
dragonveinshard.description: The leavings of special coal that contains the earth's energy within. Even these scrapes make fine fuel.

dragonboneartifact.name: Dragonbone Artifact
dragonboneartifact.description: A very rare bone from bonepiles. Evidence of an unknown elder dragon that once ruled the land.

monsterslogbone.name: Monster Slogbone
monsterslogbone.description: Bone obtained from large master rank monsters. Far heavier than its outward appearance would suggest.

monstersolidbone.name: Monster Solidbone
monstersolidbone.description: Bone obtained from large master rank monsters. Sturdy enough to withstand even the most ferocious of impacts.

conflagrantsac.name: Conflagrant Sac
conflagrantsac.description: A monster organ that contains highly volatile and extremely explosive powder. Exquisitely dangerous.

cryosac.name: Cryo Sac
cryosac.description: A monster organ that contains a potent freezing agent. Able to cover a broad area in ice instantaneously.

deadlypoisonsac.name: Deadly Poison Sac
deadlypoisonsac.description: A monster organ that contains an extremely virulent toxin. Handle with extreme care.

floodsac.name: Flood Sac
floodsac.description: A monster organ designed to hold and preserve tremendous amounts of water.

frozenbone.name: Frozen Bone
frozenbone.description: A bone found in bonepiles in the Hoarfrost Reach. Tempered by years of the tundra's unrelenting cold.

largewyverngem.name: Large Wyvern Gem
largewyverngem.description: A wyvern gem that has grown further over the ages. Emits a mesmerizing shimmer.

lightningsac.name: Lightning Sac
lightningsac.description: A monster organ that can store electricity as strong as lightning. It rumbles like thunder.

monstertoughbone.name: Monster Toughbone
monstertoughbone.description: Bone obtained from large master rank monsters. It emits a potent aura of near-limitless potential.

thickbone.name: Thick Bone
thickbone.description: Very rare bone uses as crafting material. While laborious to work, it yields results like no other.

torporsac.name: Torpor Sac
torporsac.description: A monster organ that contains a sleeping agent capable of instantly knocking out even a raging monster.

ultraplegiasac.name: Ultraplegia Sac
ultraplegiasac.description: A monster organ filled with highly concentrated neurotoxins. Handle with extreme care.

ancientcursedbone.name: Ancient Cursed Bone
ancientcursedbone.description: Rare ancient leshen material. A bone entangled in countless magical branches.

ancientleshenantlers.name: Ancient Leshen Antlers
ancientleshenantlers.description: Rare ancient leshen material. Huge, solemn antlers that inspire fear in other creatures.

ancientleshenclaw.name: Ancient Leshen Claw
ancientleshenclaw.description: Rare material. The claw of an ancient leshen, worshipped as an indigenous god in another world.

cursedbone.name: Cursed Bone
cursedbone.description: Rare material. The bone of a creature that fell prey to a leshen's cunning cruelty.

leshenantlers.name: Leshen Antlers
leshenantlers.description: Rare material. The horrifying antlers of a leshen, nourished by the innate powers of primeval woods.

leshenclaw.name: Leshen Claw
leshenclaw.description: A rare sharp leshen claw. One hit is enough to leave a deep gash on its victim.

leshenresin.name: Leshen Resin
leshenresin.description: A lump of resin excreted by the leshen. Contains arcane components that should be handled with care.

antekaantler.name: Anteka Antler
antekaantler.description: Very rare Anteka material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

prizedpelt.name: Prized Pelt
prizedpelt.description: Very rare small monster material. Obtained by carving. Warm and durable, used to craft gear.

barnoshardclaw.name: Barnos Hardclaw
barnoshardclaw.description: Very rare Barnos material. Obtained by carving. Unusual, used in select gear.

cortoshardclaw.name: Cortos Hardclaw
cortoshardclaw.description: Very rare Cortos material. Obtained by carving. Unusual, used in select gear.

wingdrakefinehide.name: Wingdrake Finehide
wingdrakefinehide.description: A very rare material carved from wingdrakes. Lightweight, used to craft gear.

hornetaurrazorwing.name: Hornetaur Razorwing
hornetaurrazorwing.description: Very rare Hornetaur material. Light and sharp used in many weapons.

monsteressence.name: Monster Essence
monsteressence.description: Material obtained from master rank small insects. The densest, most viscious fluids available. Very icky.

vespoidrazorwing.name: Vespoid Razorwing
vespoidrazorwing.description: Very rare Vespoid material. Obtained by carving. Light and sharp, used in many weapons.

lavasiothcortex.name: Lavasioth Cortex
lavasiothcortex.description: Very rare Lavasioth material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

lavasiothgrandfin.name: Lavasioth Grandfin
lavasiothgrandfin.description: Very rare Lavasioth material. Obtained by breaking its dorsal fins. Used for many purposes.

lavasiothhardfang.name: Lavasioth Hardfang
lavasiothhardfang.description: Very rare Lavasioth material. Obtained by breaking its head. Sharp, used in many weapons.

lavasiothshard.name: Lavasioth Shard
lavasiothshard.description: Very rare Lavasioth material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

beotoduscortex.name: Beotodus Cortex
beotoduscortex.description: Very rare Beotodus material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Hardly, used to craft gear.

beotodusgrandfin.name: Beotodus Grandfin
beotodusgrandfin.description: Very rare Beotodus material. Obtained by breaking its back. Used for many purposes.

beotodushardhorn.name: Beotodus Hardhorn
beotodushardhorn.description: Very rare Beotodus material. Obtained by breaking its head. Sharp, used in many weapons.

beotodusshard.name: Beotodus Shard
beotodusshard.description: Very rare Beotodus material. Mostly obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

gajauthickhide.name: Gajau Thickhide
gajauthickhide.description: Very rare Gajau material. Obtained by carving. Water-resistant, used to craft gear.

jyuratoduscortex.name: Jyuratodus Cortex
jyuratoduscortex.description: Very rare Jyuratodus material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Hardy, used to craft gear.

jyuratodusgrandfin.name: Jyuratodus Grandfin
jyuratodusgrandfin.description: Very rare Jyuratodus material. Obtained by breaking its back. Used for many purposes.

jyuratodushardfang.name: Jyuratodus Hardfang
jyuratodushardfang.description: Very rare Jyuratodus material. Obtained by breaking its head. Sharp, used in many weapons.

jyuratodusshard.name: Jyuratodus Shard
jyuratodusshard.description: Very rare Jyuratodus material. Mostly obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

steelgajauwhisker.description: Very rare Gajau material. Obtained by carving. Hardy, used to craft gear.

garugaauricle.name: Garuga Auricle
garugaauricle.description: Very rare Yian Garuga material. Obtained by breaking its head. Supple, used to craft gear.

garugacortex.name: Garuga Cortex
garugacortex.description: Very rare Yian Garuga material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

garugafellwing.name: Garuga Fellwing
garugafellwing.description: Very rare Yian Garuga material. Obtained by breaking its wings. Supple, used to craft gear.

garugalash.name: Garuga Lash
garugalash.description: Very rare Yian Garuga material. Mostly obtained by carving its severed tail. Stiff, used to craft gear.

garugashard.name: Garuga Shard
garugashard.description: Very rare Yian Garuga material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

garugasilverpelt.name: Garuga Silverpelt
garugasilverpelt.description: Very rare Yian Garuga material. Obtained by breaking its back. Used for many purposes.

fancybeak.name: Fancy Beak
fancybeak.description: Very rare Yian Garuga material. Obtained by breaking its head. Stout, used in many weapons.

scratchedshell.name: Scratched Shell
scratchedshell.description: Very rare Yian Garuga material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Hardened by a lifetime of battles.

coralpukei-pukeicortex.name: Coral Pukei-Pukei Cortex
coralpukei-pukeicortex.description: Very rare Coral Pukei-Pukei material. Mostly obtained as a reward Solid, used to craft gear.

coralpukei-pukeifellwing.name: Coral Pukei-Pukei Fellwing
coralpukei-pukeifellwing.description: Very rare Coral Pukei-Pukei material. Obtained by breaking its wings. used for many purposes.

largecoralpukei-pukeisac.name: Large Coral Pukei-Pukei Sac
largecoralpukei-pukeisac.description: Very rare Coral Pukei-Pukei material. Obtained by breaking its head. Grants water element properties.

coralpukei-pukeilash.name: Coral Pukei-Pukei Lash
coralpukei-pukeilash.description: Very rare Coral Pukei-Pukei material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Unusual, used to craft gear.

coralpukei-pukeishard.name: Coral Pukei-Pukei Shard
coralpukei-pukeishard.description: Very rare Coral Pukei-Pukei material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

feywyverngem.name: Fey Wyvern Gem
feywyverngem.description: An exceptionally pure gem taken from a bird wyvern. Its fragility makes it difficult to carve.

largekulu-ya-kubeak.name: Large Kulu-Ya-Ku Beak
largekulu-ya-kubeak.description: Very rare Kulu-Ya-Ku material. Obtained by breaking its head. Hard, used in many weapons.

largekulu-ya-kuplume.name: Large Kulu-Ya-Ku Plume
largekulu-ya-kuplume.description: Very rare Kulu-Ya-Ku material. Obtained by breaking its forelimbs. Used for many purposes.

kulu-ya-kushard.name: Kulu-Ya-Ku Shard
kulu-ya-kushard.description: Very rare Kulu-Ya-Ku material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

kulu-ya-kuthickhide.name: Kulu-Ya-Ku Thickhide
kulu-ya-kuthickhide.description: Very rare Kulu-Ya-Ku material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Supple, used to craft gear.

pukei-pukeicortex.name: Pukei-Pukei Cortex
pukei-pukeicortex.description: Very rare Pukei-Pukei material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

pukei-pukeifellwing.name: Pukei-Pukei Fellwing
pukei-pukeifellwing.description: Very rare Pukei-Pukei material. Obtained by breaking its wings. Used for many purposes.

largepukei-pukeisac.name: Large Pukei-Pukei Sac
largepukei-pukeisac.description: Very rare Pukei-Pukei material. Obtained by breaking its head. Grants poisonous properties.

pukei-pukeilash.name: Pukei-Pukei Lash
pukei-pukeilash.description: Very rare Pukei-Pukei material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Unusual, used to craft gear.

tzitzi-ya-kuhardclaw.name: Tzitzi-Ya-Ku Hardclaw
tzitzi-ya-kuhardclaw.description: Very rare Tzitzi-Ya-Ku material. Mostly obtained by carving. Solid, used to craft gear.

tzitzi-ya-kuphotomembrane.name: Tzitzi-Ya-Ku Photomembrane
tzitzi-ya-kuphotomembrane.description: Very rare Tzitzi-Ya-Kumaterial obtained by breaking its pulse organs. Used for many purposes.

tzitzi-ya-kushard.name: Tzitzi-Ya-Ku Shard
tzitzi-ya-kushard.description: Very rare Tzitzi-Ya-Ku material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

tzitzi-ya-kuthickhide.name: Tzitzi-Ya-Ku Thickhide
tzitzi-ya-kuthickhide.description: Very rare Tzitzi-Ya-Ku material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Supple, used to craft gear.

goldrajangpelt+.name: Gold Rajang Pelt+

wigglerpot.name: Wiggler Pot

banukwarriorsymbol.name: Banuk Warrior Symbol
banukwarriorsymbol.description: Given to warriors who can boast of braving the Frozen Wilds. Allows you to craft special equipment.
